item.title: Shapes of distributions
item.description: Get formatted versions: Word : PDF Orientation As youâ€™ve probably figured out already, the columns of data frames are called variables because the values in the column are not all the same, that is, they vary. In the early 1800s, it was discovered that many different variables have a pattern in common: the most common values are near the mean and values become less common the further they are from the mean.
